alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL COLUMBUS AND NORTHWESTERN HORRY COUNTIES... At 609 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Green Sea to Hallsboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Cherry Grove, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Crusoe Island, and Green Sea. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
